```{r}
setwd("C://projectbuffer//contest")

install.packages("tidyr")

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

b_aq_simple <- read.csv("beijing_17_18_aq.csv")
b_meo_simple <- read.csv("beijing_17_18_meo.csv")

b_aq_raw <- read.csv("beijing_historical_meo_grid.csv")

glimpse(b_aq_raw)

grid000 <- b_aq_raw %>% filter(stationName == "beijing_grid_000")
grid000_time <- separate(grid000, utc_time, c("y","m","d","h"))

daxing_aq <- b_aq_simple %>% filter(stationId == "daxing_aq")

str(daxing_aq)
str(grid000_time)

j000_daxing_t <- inner_join(daxing_aq, grid000, by = c("utc_time"))
j000_daxing <- j000_daxing_t %>% separate(utc_time, c("y","m","d","h"))

str(j000_daxing)

lm_000_daxing <- lm(PM2.5 ~ temperature + pressure + humidity + wind_direction + wind_speed.kph + m + h + d , data = j000_daxing)



```

```{r}
summary(lm_000_daxing)
```

```{r}
sort(lm_000_daxing$coefficients)
```
